Transcription-Unit.comment: A gene expression analysis demonstrated that the ybdO gene is negatively regulated by the transcriptional factor HNS [Higashi16]. Two specific regions appear to be involved in that regulation; one of the them is located upstream of the gene start site (from -250 to -176) and the other one is located downstream of the gene start site (from +27 to +164) [Higashi16]. Another region was identified that reduces the transcription of ybdO in an HNS-independent way [Higashi16]. The sequence in this region containing an HNS-independent negative element is different in strains other than E. coli K-12 [Higashi16].

Evidence-Code.comment: Automated inference. A computer inferred this assertion through one of many possible methods such as sequence similarity, recognized motifs or consensus sequence, etc. When a person made the inference from computational evidence, use EV-COMP-HINF.
